name: Archbishop. Simon Karisa
title: Archbishop
bio: Archbishop  Simon Karisa has served the PCOF fellowship since 2010. He previously pastored several congregations and has a passion for church planting, pastoral training and community outreach.

name: Bishop. Folonzi Auma
title: General Secretary
bio: Rev. Grace coordinates national operations, communications and training programs across our network of churches.

name: Mr. Sam Otieno
title: Treasurer
bio: Sam oversees PCOF financial stewardship, donor reporting and compliance. He manages budgets for national programs and church support initiatives.

name: Bishop Mary Kimani
title: Regional Bishop - Rift Valley
bio: Bishop Mary supports pastors and local church leaders in the Rift Valley region, focusing on training and community development.
